# 20230807

## [문제](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?ssl=27&ssc=1&pln=21&pc=1#)

```ts
type Chunk<
  T extends any[],
  N extends number,
  Swap extends any[] = []
> = Swap["length"] extends N
  ? [Swap, ...Chunk<T, N>]
  : T extends [infer K, ...infer L]
  ? Chunk<L, N, [...Swap, K]>
  : Swap extends []
  ? Swap
  : [Swap];
```

넘 어렵다..
